attributes.action: Ask for Cpl Mark Palmer to be evicted out of the Clerks office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although Cpl Mark Palmer believe's he is an asset to the Clerk's office at 207 signal squadron in sunny Hohne, his performance has been adequate at best and the under-signed wish for him to be thrown out as soon as possible.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
